channel.title: How do i add objects?
channel.description:
How do i add objects, such as Trees,Walls,Banks,ect..
Because i would like to add fences ect, to make my server look nice :D

item.title: How do i add objects?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

For objects just go into client.java and search for

Makeglobalobject

You should see something like this.

	       makeGlobalObject(3657, 3523, 2366, 0, 10);//Sign

3657 is the x cord
3523 is the y cord
2366 is the Object id
0 is the way its facing you can do 0 1 2 3
keep 10 at 10

For walls it has something to do with replaceobject. But i don’t know the Wall, fence, etc Id’s
-Tyrael-

Read full topic
